languages.text: {n}Паскаль осуждающе щелкает клешнями {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрита{/g}.{/n} "Не надо проявлять непочтение к древнему духу машины, которому прислуживает сей аколит".

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль осуждающе щелкает клешнями {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрита{/g}.{/n} "Не надо проявлять непочтение к древнему духу машины, которому прислуживает сей аколит".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal clicks the claws of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} in disapproval.{/n} "Do not be disrespectful to the ancient machine spirit this acolyte serves."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal lässt missbilligend die Krallen seines {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} klappern.{/n} "Behandelt den uralten Maschinengeist, dem dieser Akolyth dient, nicht so respektlos."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks the claws of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} in disapproval.{/n} "Do not be disrespectful to the ancient machine spirit this acolyte serves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal lässt missbilligend die Krallen seines {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrit}Mechadendriten{/g} klappern.{/n} "Behandelt den uralten Maschinengeist, dem dieser Akolyth dient, nicht so respektlos."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal active les pinces de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} en signe de désapprobation.{/n} « Ne manquez pas de respect envers l'esprit de l'ancienne machine que sert cet acolyte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks the claws of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} in disapproval.{/n} "Do not be disrespectful to the ancient machine spirit this acolyte serves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal active les pinces de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} en signe de désapprobation.{/n} « Ne manquez pas de respect envers l'esprit de l'ancienne machine que sert cet acolyte. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡不满地动了动{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}的爪子。{/n}“请不要对这位侍仆所服侍的古老机魂不敬。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks the claws of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} in disapproval.{/n} "Do not be disrespectful to the ancient machine spirit this acolyte serves."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡不满地动了动{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}的爪子。{/n}“请不要对这位侍仆所服侍的古老机魂不敬。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}の爪を非難するようにカチャカチャと鳴らした。{/n}「このアコライトが仕える古の機械精霊を軽んじてはいけません」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks the claws of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} in disapproval.{/n} "Do not be disrespectful to the ancient machine spirit this acolyte serves."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは、{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}の爪を非難するようにカチャカチャと鳴らした。{/n}「このアコライトが仕える古の機械精霊を軽んじてはいけない」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal chasquea las garras de su {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} en señal de desaprobación.{/n} «No sea irrespetuoso con el antiguo espíritu máquina al que sirve este acólito».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks the claws of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} in disapproval.{/n} "Do not be disrespectful to the ancient machine spirit this acolyte serves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal chasquea las garras de su {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} en señal de desaprobación.{/n} «No sea irrespetuoso con el antiguo espíritu máquina al que sirve este acólito».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritinin{/g} pençelerini ayıplarcasına şaklatıyor.{/n} "Bu havarinin hizmet ettiği kadim makine ruhuna hürmetsizlik edilmemeli."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks the claws of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} in disapproval.{/n} "Do not be disrespectful to the ancient machine spirit this acolyte serves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, ayıplarcasına {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g} pençelerini şaklatıyor.{/n} "Bu havarinin hizmet ettiği kadim makine ruhuna saygısızlık etmemeli."
